entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries beginning this morning. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
